I recognize this is the very next thing to be addressed following code freeze.  What timeline and expectation could we set for the customer?

@Salesforce @Ethan Israel @Chris Brooks @Helen Randall A fix for the SPAC Activity Resource Manager performance issue has been made and will be available in tomorrow's CU (01/24/2025). A hotfix has been sent out. Expect link shortly.



Dev team is actively investigating the FK issue.

On Escalation Ticket # 00425940 the new comment has been added: Hotfix available in this KB article: https://nwxcorp.lightning.force.com/lightning/r/General__kav/ka0Qk000000BubZIAS/view

On Escalation Ticket # 00425940 the new comment has been added: The topic of this issue is:
"Unable to perform bulk import Error: The MERGE statement conflicted with the FOREIGN KEY constraint "FK_SA_SPAA_Trustees_SiteCollectionId". The conflict occurred in database "StealthauditDB", table "dbo.SA_SPAA_Resources".
The statement has been terminated."

How did we wind up with a hotfix for table indexes?

On Escalation Ticket # 00425940 the new comment has been added: Ethan Israel:

@Salesforce @Helen Randall - that was the original topic of this escalation. However, on 11/26 support asked us to take a look at the "EmailFromCustomer" doc which detailed a performance issue they were having with the Adding activity Resources step of the SPAA scan. We looked into that and found that it was the same issue we were already investigating for another customer, so we linked the cases on our side. We now have a fix to the SPAC Activity Resource Manager (which includes new indexes) that will resolve that issue they spelled out in the "EmailFromCustomer" doc. 


Since that separate issue was raised for this customer as part of this ticket, and we now have a HF for it, we provided that HF on thursday and mentioned that the Dev team is actively investigating the FK issue, which is still the case. That's on the current sprint being actively investigated. 

[DevOps CommentId:11566119]
On Escalation Ticket # 00425940 the new comment has been added: We are due to update the customer on the progress of the FK fix.  What ETA could I communicate?
On Escalation Ticket # 00425940 the new comment has been added: An update is due to the customer today. What can I communicate?
On Escalation Ticket # 00425940 the new comment has been added: Hey team- any updates?

On Escalation Ticket # 00425940 the new comment has been added: @Ethan Israel

Hey team- any chance we can get the following:
Can you help us with a short summary as to what they think the issue is, what additional bug we found, and an estimated timeline?

Please arrange a meeting with customer next time this issue happens. We want to troubleshoot it at the customer's end.

@Ethan Israel @Helen Randall @Mike Longo @Chris Brooks @Michael Burrofato
